Literature.Title: Ultra-short lipopeptides against gram-positive bacteria while alleviating antimicrobial resistance.
Literature.Author: Zhong C, Zhang F, Zhu N, Zhu Y, Yao J, Gou S, Xie J, Ni J

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=128 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:45% Killing=64 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:80% Killing=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=4µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus 75(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus 113(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=64µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µM)
